name: Break your keyboard - VGLgamejam-2021
description:
👾👾 Aidez le petit bonhomme vert à détruire tous les monstres, le tout en 60 secondes max ! 👾👾

- Appuyez sur la lettre associer au monstre le plus proche pour lui donner un coup
- Attention ! Certains  monstres ont besoin de plusieurs coups !

Have fun et ne cassez pas votre clavier !

This game was created during VGLgamejam 2021 using my own game engine: MiniGDX

- Checkout the game code: https://github.com/dwursteisen/VGLgamejam-2021
- Checkout the project page: https://github.com/minigdx/minigdx
- Checkout some examples: https://minigdx.github.io/minigdx-showcase/
- Checkout game created with my game engine on itch.io: https://itch.io/games/tag-minigdx
- Create your own game by using this game template: https://github.com/minigdx/minigdx-game-template
- Sprites from Kenney 1-Bit Pack - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
